Configuration summary: Operating system (Linux), Quantity (24), Pricing strategy (Compute Savings Plans 1 Year No Upfront), Storage amount (30 GB), Instance type (t3.2xlarge)
Operating system (Linux), Quantity (24), Pricing strategy (Compute Savings Plans 1 Year No Upfront), Storage amount (30 GB), Instance type (t3.2xlarge)
S3 Standard storage (10000 GB per month)
Number of Metrics (includes detailed and custom metrics) (100), Standard Logs: Data Ingested (10 GB), Number of Custom/Cross-account events (100), Number of Dashboards (30)
Storage amount (15000 GB), Additional backup storage (15000 GB)
Number of EC2 instances (2), Number of EIPs per instance (1)

Rationale

For higher budget rising from 9000 USD to 20 000 USD
- Max number of EC2 instances was increased to 24 
   Offering scalable 2x redundancy for peak loads to be able to handle even more users
- EC2 instances were increased to t3.2xlarge (Memory: 32GiB, vCPU: 8)
  - To decrease processing request time for each user and offer slighly better user experience
- As DB server is used serverless Aurora DB 
    With automated scaling to offer fast response at any loads
